title: Which TV show degraded the worst towards its end, 'That ‘70s show' or 'M.A.S.H.'? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’d say That 70’s Show. I’ve binged on MASH before & I found the finale to be just as nice as the 1st episode. Whereas as many have pointed out, That 70’s Show went downhill after Topher Grace left. If MASH had degraded there’s no way it would be able to hold the record for the most watched finale in American TV history. In fact, the finale is the ninth most watched TV broadcast, beaten only by the Super Bowl broadcasts from 2010–2017. I just wish today’s TV writers are as good as the ones writing MASH.

Imho, of course: “That 70s Show” was underrated throughout its time, but that being said, the seasons after Topher Grace left were a sad echo of his tenure. Eric Forman was the center of the show; almost all scenes were set in his house, and it was his relationships that we mainly followed. M*A*S*H* got stale, to be sure, but the main characters stayed until the bitter(sweet) end. I think you’d find a better comparison to the Eric-less “70s Show” with the Hawkeye and BJ-less “AfterM*A*S*H* instead.
